en.already_in_chain: You are already in the chain!

en.fix_anonymous: Welcome to the Bio Chain (v2.0)! The bot detected that you're an anonymous user. To join the chain, you need to reveal your identity. Once you've done that, simply send /start so we know who you are.
en.forbidden: You cannot use that command here.
en.invite_format:
Finally, you must join the group. Make sure not to leave it, or you will break the chain!

https://{}
en.join_help: You need to put @{} in your Telegram bio and click 'Continue'

en.pm_start: Welcome to the Bio Chain (v2.0)! To join, simply go to @{}. We can continue this conversation there.
en.read_rules: Please read @{} and select a button
en.set_bio: Please put @{} in your Telegram bio and select a button
en.set_username: Please set a username on your Telegram account - https://telegram.org/faq#q-what-are-usernames-how-do-i-get-one
en.start_bot: Sorry, I can't help you join the chain until you've sent me a message first. Please send me a message before clicking continue.
en.start_help: You have to read the rules and click on 'Accept the rules'
en.untrusted_forbidden: You cannot load untrusted trees for security reasons.
en.username_help: You need to set a username (handle) on Telegram. It can be whatever you want. See @username and https://telegram.org/faq#q-what-are-usernames-how-do-i-get-one for help getting one. Once you've set it, click 'Continue'
